text:
Ringo Lam Ling-Tung (, Cantonese: Lam Ling-tung; 1955 – 29 December 2018) was a Hong Kong director, producer, and screenwriter. His best known work was "Aces Go Places IV". Lam directed "City on Fire" in 1987, which led him to winning his first Hong Kong Film Award.
On December 29, 2018, Lam was found dead at his home in Hong Kong, aged 63.
